p: When linking the results obtained in terms of geographical variation with those regarding the incidence of non-communicable diseases (NCDs) in different areas of Peru based on official national data [ 21], no clear tendencies were visible. Interestingly, the city with highest GHG emissions per capita in the diet also presented the highest rate of people overweight in the nation: Puerto Maldonado. However, no clear relationships were seen between the proportion of overweight people and the GHG emissions when all the cities were examined.
